text: Hagi anantetira Babiloni kini nemo'a Zedekaiana avreno Babiloni vanigeno umani nesanige'na, Nagra anantega ome kegahue. Hagi kagra Babiloni vahera hara huzamante'gahananagi kasamarenka hara huzamagate oregahane huno, Ra Anumzamo'a hie hunka kasnampa kea hu'nane nehuno, Zedekaia'a Jeremaiana kina hunte'ne.
